record_locks.banner.contention_notice: Another user opened this record while you are editing it. Conflicts may occur on save.
record_locks.banner.locked_by_other: This record is currently locked by another user.
record_locks.banner.mine: You are currently editing this record.
record_locks.banner.optimistic_notice: Another user is editing this record. Conflicts may occur on save.
record_locks.banner.participants_notice: Multiple users are currently on this record.
record_locks.banner.same_user_session: This record is already open in another session.
record_locks.conflict.accept_incoming_fa: Could not accept incoming changes. Refresh and try again.
record_locks.conflict.description: The record was changed by another user after you started editing.
record_locks.conflict.no_field_details: Field-level conflict details are unavailable for this record. Choose a resolution to continue.
record_locks.conflict.override_blocked_n: You cannot keep your version because you do not have permission to override incoming changes.
record_locks.conflict.record_deleted_des: This record was deleted by another user while you were editing. Saving is blocked to avoid unexpected results.
record_locks.conflict.title: Conflict detected
record_locks.errors.acquire_failed: Failed to load record lock status.
record_locks.errors.force_release_unavai: Force release is unavailable because takeover is disabled or the lock is no longer active.
record_locks.notifications.conflict_dete: Your save conflicted with a more recent change. Changed fields: {changedFields}.
record_locks.notifications.conflict_reso: A record conflict has been resolved.
record_locks.notifications.incoming_chan: This record was updated by another user. Changed fields: {changedFields}.
record_locks.notifications.lock_contende: Another user opened a record you are currently editing. Conflicts may occur on save.
record_locks.notifications.lock_force_re: Another user force released your lock on a record.
record_locks.notifications.record_delete: A record you had open was deleted by another user.
record_locks.notifications.participant_j: Another user opened this record while you are editing it.
record_locks.notifications.participant_l: A user left this record (heartbeat expired).
record_locks.settings.allow_incoming_ove: Users still need the record_locks.override_incoming feature in their role or user ACL to keep their version during conflicts.
record_locks.settings.description: Configure optimistic/pessimistic locking and conflict handling.
record_locks.settings.enabled_resources_: Pick from suggestions or type a custom resource kind.
Add resource kind and press Enter
record_locks.settings.strategy_help_opti: Multiple users can edit at the same time; conflicts are checked on save.
record_locks.settings.strategy_help_pess: First editor acquires the lock and blocks concurrent edits until release.
record_locks.settings.title: Record locking
record_locks.title: Record locking
